## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass (`uv run pytest` / `npm run test`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`uv run ruff check .` / `npm run lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build` for frontend changes)
- [ ] New features include tests
- [ ] Breaking changes are documented
